dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, without hesitation or reserve.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private and only share them with those they trust.

dimensions.label: Risk-Taking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and assertive risks, pushing boundaries and challenging the status quo.
Your FarTwin will avoid taking unnecessary risks, prioritizing caution and stability over adventure.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront and challenge opposing viewpoints, refusing to back down or compromise.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and work towards a mutually beneficial solution, listening actively to others' perspectives.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with social groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assert their presence and influence within social groups, taking charge and leading others.
Your FarTwin will focus on supporting and nurturing others, providing emotional and practical assistance to those in need.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on instinct and intuition, making rapid and decisive choices without overthinking.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options, considering multiple perspectives and seeking guidance before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Personal Growth
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on achieving their goals and ambitions, driving themselves to succeed and push beyond their limits.
Your FarTwin will prioritize the well-being of others, putting their own needs and desires secondary to those of those around them.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle emotional challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be empathetic and compassionate, prioritizing the emotional needs of themselves and others.
Your FarTwin will develop coping strategies and learn to manage their emotions, maintaining a sense of stability and calm in the face of adversity.
